content: That's a great template, I'll definitely use it. I think I'll start by tracking my points for FreshMart and PetPalooza, since they have a points-based system. But for The Daily Grind, I just need to keep track of the number of stamps I have, since it's a stamp-based system. I'm still two stamps away from getting a free drink, so I'll make sure to grab a coffee there soon.
